SEARCH
Package othellogame.ui.view

Class OfflinePlayingView

java.lang.Object
othellogame.ui.view.OfflinePlayingView
public class OfflinePlayingView extends Object
Represents the controller for the OfflinePlayingScene FXML file in the Othello game application.

It handles the user interface for setting up an offline Othello game, including player names, avatars, and game initiation.

Follows the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern.

Version:
1.0, 12/07/2023
Author:
Dinh Thuy Nhat Vy
See Also:

      private void changeAvatar(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Handles the mouse click event on the avatar change arrows, updating the displayed avatars accordingly.
      Parameters:
      e - the MouseEvent triggered by the player.

    • showAvatar

      private void showAvatar(int playerIndex, boolean isRightArrow)
      Updates the displayed avatars for a player based on arrow clicks.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - the index of the player whose avatar is being changed.
      isRightArrow - true if the right arrow is clicked, false if the left arrow is clicked.

    • getAvatar

      private javafx.scene.image.Image getAvatar(int avatarIndex)
      Retrieves the appropriate avatar image based on the given avatar index.
      Parameters:
      avatarIndex - the index representing a specific avatar.
      Returns:
      the Image object corresponding to the specified avatar index.

    • createNewGame

      private void createNewGame()
      Handles the "NEXT" button click event, initiating an offline game with the provided usernames and avatars.

      Displays warnings if username input is missing.

    • menuSoundControl

      public void menuSoundControl()
      Controls the menu sound, toggling between on and off states.
